name: scary-poems
scary-1:
The dark raven
it's an ill omen
when your life is at it's end
you will see
the raven has come for me
scary-2:
I sat in my room. Pondering
They were watching
waiting. For the end.
scary-3:
On my way home i walk past a cemetery. Nothing ever happens
it is a quiet place
usually. An old lady stands in front of an old grave
We talk for a while. She says I am delightful!
We would have been friends
were she alive
scary-4:
They whisper to me
about things past and yet to come. All I must is listen
closely
to the abyss. I gaze upon them
they gaze upon me.
